About the Company: ATV Projects India Ltd. is engaged in the business of executing turnkey projects.The company undertakes conversion jobs for power plants, boilers, heat exchangers and other works, supplies equipment for several industries such as sugar, fertilizer, chemical, petrochemicals, steel, power, nuclear power, and allied industries by manufacturing equipment parts and components at its Mathura plant and executing the remaining parts at various sites of thier clients.
